data.title: Was there any gas rationing in the United States during World War II?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 2): Yes. The US was the worldâ€™s biggest producer of oil and gasoline, and should not have had to ration gas, BUT strict gas rationing was introduced during the war. The reason was to reduce the miles being driven by the public, not to save gas, but to save rubber! The Japanese had ov...
